title: How to Solve 8 Puzzle

steps.headline: Make an empty spot next to 3.

parts.name: Solving the Second and Third Row

steps.headline: Put 4 right next to 7.
steps.description: Move 7 temporarily if you have to.

steps.headline: Put 5 right next to 8.
steps.description: Move 8 temporarily if you have to.

text: Solving the First Row Put 1 on its original place.  Place 3 right next to 1.  Place 2 under 3.  Make an empty spot next to 3.  Push 3 to the empty spot.  Push 2 upward.  Solving the Second and Third Row Put 7 under 1.  Put 4 right next to 7. Move 7 temporarily if you have to. Make an empty space under 7.  Push 7 downward.  Push 4 to the left.  Put 8 under 2.  Put 5 right next to 8. Move 8 temporarily if you have to. Make on empty space under 8.  Push 8 downward.  Push 5 to the left.  Put 6 on its original space. Then, the puzzle is solved!
